entry.title: Combined summary - Lightning Network
entry.summary: In response to a comment made by Peter Todd regarding the ownership of the domain vistomail.com, Satoshi Nakamoto clarifies that the domain has not changed hands since he registered it. He explains that the update on who.is is simply an addition of years to the ownership to prevent the domain from expiring. Satoshi expresses his frustration with Peter's constant arguments and smart ass comments on Twitter, urging him to stop arguing and work harder instead. He mentions that he sees everything and acknowledges that the new developers no longer want him around, but he is fine with that.Satoshi further adds that he has added satoshin at vistomail.com and contact at vistomail.com as lightning addresses to prevent Craig Wright from suing everyone and claiming to be the creator of Bitcoin. He states that he has many other ways to prove his identity as the real Satoshi but has never felt the need to do so because he knows he is the real deal. In addition, Satoshi reveals that he has seen all the messages, including Peter's, and compliments the Lightning team for their excellent work. He thanks them for making him feel welcomed.In summary, Satoshi Nakamoto clarifies the ownership of the domain vistomail.com and expresses his frustration with Peter Todd's arguments. He adds lightning addresses to prevent Craig Wright from falsely claiming to be the creator of Bitcoin and praises the Lightning team for their achievements.
